about_the_game:
► This is a mysterious tale of magic, love, and blood ties happened in the late winter of the Taisho era.

In this diverse romance visual novel, you will follow the journey of the amnesiac actor, Kotori Sakuma. To escape an impending imprisonment, as well as investigate the truth behind a friend's death, he will explore the unknown forces of the other side of the world—whether willingly or reluctantly—and uncover the secrets behind the death. Ultimately, the choice will come: return to the embrace of your bloodline, or pursue complete freedom.

As you approach the truth, you will dive deeper into the characters’ inner emotions, savor the intricate entanglements with them, and experience the fate of parting ways through multiple endings. Behind the veils, where death intertwines with bonds, every choice you make will impact character relationships, story progression, and the ultimate conclusion.

► The sacred object that determines the path ahead—some call it destiny, while others attribute it to “me.”

The amnesiac actor, Kotori Sakuma, who lost his past memories in an accident, travels to Tokyo with his troupe to prepare for the premiere of a new script.

However, his previously peaceful life is shattered by an unexpected event—something he says suddenly possesses unknown power. Conseuqently, the other side of the world, which ordinary people cannot touch, reveals its secrets to him.

Before investigating his forgotten past, which may hold the key to answering his confusion, the suspicious death of his friend drags him into a murder accusation.

Please join Kotori Sakuma in Tokyo on the eve of Valentine’s Day in 1921, as he explores the unknown conspiracy and the forgotten chapters of his life.

This game is a fantasy-themed AVG set in a semi-fictitious world based on Japan’s Taisho era.

The game is expected to contain approximately 400,000 Chinese characters of text, 4 romanceable characters and 13 different endings, with a TE (True End) that can only be unlocked in the second playthrough.

Warning

  • This game contains fem dom and BL content.

  • The game includes depictions of blood, grotesque elements, self-harm, incestuous relationships, Lovecraftian horror, immoral and criminal behaviors.

  • The viewpoints of the characters do not represent the author's stance. This story is purely fictional and is not related to any real persons, events, or organizations. If you feel uncomfortable while playing, please exit the game immediately.

Features

  • A captivating 400,000-Chinese-charater original plot

  • 4 romanceable characters with distinct styles

  • Over 50 carefully drawn CG illustrations (excluding variations)

  • Over 10 various endings

  • A mix of Western and Eastern Taisho-era atmosphere and cultural vibes

Kotori Sakuma

  • The protagonist of the game and lead actor of the “Emerald Eye” troupe. The story primarily unfolds from his perspective.

  • He lost most of his past memories a year before the story begins. Though he seems to have adapted well, his past won’t let him go so easily.

  • He appears aloof, but his inner world is abundent, and he sometimes lacks common sense. Could the past he’d rather not recall be related to this?

Hatsuyuki Imaeda

  • Also known as Snezana Arkadievna Baryakinskaya, the lead actress of the “Emerald Eye” troupe and possibly the fastest-to-die heroine in AVG history.

  • A lively and cheerful Russian girl. She was once a classmate of the protagonist and Mochizuki, and the three of them have known each other for a long time. Despite the protagonist losing his memory, their friendship remains intact.

  • She seems to have secrets she’s reluctant to talk about as well, but the chance to reveal them has gone forever.

Kazuya Mochitsuki

  • The leader of the “Emerald Eye” troupe and the protagonist’s close friend and former classmate.

  • Although he’s 25, he still keeps a bobbed hairstyle and secretly sews lace on his clothes.

  • Instead of being a leader, he often takes on the role of caretaker for the troupe members. However, he can be quite stubborn when it comes to matters he believes in.

  • For some reason, he always carried a suitcase with him.

  • Since the incident, he’s been heavy-hearted, as though he’s afraid of something.

Sarina Sakuma

  • A mysterious girl with a tendency of binge eating, the protagonist’s sister, and a regular customer at the café near his residence. They don’t seem to have any conflicts, but she makes him feel very uneasy…

  • She’s even more aloof than the protagonist and speaks little.

  • Rumors say she was once the heir to a House, but after the House's downfall and some odd rumors, her position became awkward.

Minami Sakuma

  • A mysterious investor of the troupe, the protagonist’s uncle, and the head of a House. A remarkable person who single-handedly revived the decaying House and transformed it into today's massive empire.

  • Most people think he’s a philanthropist and capable entrepreneur, but rumors about how he became the head of the family suggest something disreputable. However, he never cares.

  • He’s always smiling, althourgh there seems to be some unpleasant history between him and the protagonist.

———————————————————————————————————————————————

Staff

Script: Whitefish

Art: Norika

Programming: Sinope

*For the full credits, see the "About" section in the game.
detailed_description:
About SweetSome Studio

To stay updated, please follow @甜某工作室SweetSome. We are available on Xiaohongshu, Weibo, and Bilibili, under the same name.

———————————————————————————————————————————————

SweetSome Studio is composed of 3 female developers, dedicated to telling the stories we love through games.

Although we are not professionals and do not develop full-time, we still approach our work with sincerity and passion, putting our best effort into every creation. Despite the limitations we face, which may lead to some imperfections in our work, we hope that this game will bring players a unique experience and enjoyment.

May this game be a beautiful memory belonging to both you and us.


About the Game

► This is a mysterious tale of magic, love, and blood ties happened in the late winter of the Taisho era.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.6
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics Chip
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

name: Taishō Romance Theater

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 960
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: This diverse romance visual novel follows amnesiac actor Kotori Sakuma as he uncovers hidden truths and navigates intricate relationships. Through choices that shape character bonds and story progression, you will explore multiple endings and experience a blend of mystery and love in the Taisho era.
